name: Highway Driving Simulator
description:
Highway Driving Simulator is finally here! Get behind the wheels of steering of sports car, turn the key, rev the engine and start your awesome racing car ride to conquer city streets and sky through crazy paths

Features:
Console Quality Graphics
Cruise on different highways with different sports cars
Several of Camera Angles
Explore highway racing Environment
Very smooth Control and interface
Loads of high-speed sports cars
Completely Free and Offline Play
